          <title>
            <string language="en">Testing conductivity of sulphur</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Prüfenleitfähigkeit des Schwefels</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Conductivité de test de soufre</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Conductivity testando do enxôfre</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Conducibilità difficile di zolfo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εξεταστική αγωγιμότητα του θείου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Conductividad de prueba del sulfuro</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows an experimental set-up to test whether sulphur is a metal or a non-metal, that is, if it conducts electricity or not.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">electricity</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sulphur</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">conduction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">conductivity</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">experiment</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">metal</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">non-metal</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">test</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt eine experimentelle 
Installation zum Test, ob Schwefel ein Metall oder ein Nichtmetall 
d.h. ist wenn er Elektrizität oder nicht leitet.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre une installation 
expérimentale à l'essai si le soufre est un métal ou un non-métal,
c.-à-d., s'il conduit l'électricité ou pas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra uma instalação 
experimental ao teste se o enxôfre é um metal ou um não-metal, isto
é, se conduzir a eletricidade ou não.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra una messa a punto 
sperimentale alla prova se lo zolfo è un metallo o un metalloide, 
cioè, se conduce l'elettricità oppure no.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει πειραματική οργάνωση για 
να εξετάσει εάν το θείο είναι ένα μέταλλο ή ένα αμέταλλο, 
δηλαδή εάν διευθύνει την ηλεκτρική ενέργεια ή όχι.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra una disposición 
experimental a la prueba si el sulfuro es un metal o un no metal, es 
decir, si conduce electricidad o no.</string>
          </description>
